about_the_game:
Straight Up Command Console DLC:

Dive even deeper into the world of Straight Up with the 'Straight Up Command Console' DLC and experience brand-new features that will elevate your gaming experience to a new level! This DLC offers an innovative command console with a total of 30 powerful commands, allowing players to shape the gameplay according to their preferences.

New Characters with Style:
Look forward to the introduction of three unique characters that will revolutionize your playstyle. Each character can be activated through special commands, and for an extra cool factor, there are also variants with stylish glasses that can be unlocked through commands as well.

Map Teleportation and Checkpoints:
Utilize the enhanced features to move swiftly across the three available maps. Each map has three checkpoints that you can teleport to with a simple command. This strategic ability allows you to access areas that are difficult to reach on flat surfaces.

Easy Game Control:
Take control of the game with the special start and restart commands. Start any map of your choice with a single command and stay in control. In case of any issues, the two restart commands provide the option to effortlessly restart the level or even the entire game.

Clear Command List:
Always stay informed about the available commands by simply entering the /Help command. This will display a detailed list of all available commands, allowing you to quickly and efficiently unleash the full potential of the 'Straight Up Command Console' DLC.

Immerse yourself in a world of unlimited possibilities and set new standards for fun and control with the 'Straight Up Command Console' DLC. Your adventure in Straight Up has never been so personal and customizable!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:

short_description: With the Straight Up Command Console DLC, you get a powerful command console with 30 commands, three new characters (including a cool pair of glasses), map teleportation. /Help shows you all available commands. Experience Straight Up in a completely new way!
